name: Minestorm (Rémi)
description:
1982, there is no telephone, there is still fresh air outside. Your best friend Matthieu suggests that you go to the arcade. After all why not ? You grab coins from your mother's desk, you grab your bike too and you take a long trip to the city center. 

After a few hours on the machine, that's it, highscore beaten. It was the best day of your short life. And it stayed this way. Or maybe not?

Why not try this 40 year old game again?

(You can also access the source code of the game here!)
